text: In those days saw I in Judah some men treading wine-presses on the sabbath, and bringing in sheaves, and lading asses <FI>therewith<Fi> ; as also wine, grapes, and figs, and all manner of burdens, which they brought into Jerusalem on the sabbath day: and I testified <FI>against them<Fi> in the day wherein they sold victuals.
name: Nehemiah 13:15
